com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.gles

Class FlatShadedProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.gles.FlatShadedProgram

  • public class FlatShadedProgram
extends Object
    GL program and supporting functions for flat-shaded rendering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlatShadedProgram()
      Prepares the program in the current EGL context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Issues the draw call.

      • FlatShadedProgram

    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases the program.

      • draw

        public void draw(float[] mvpMatrix,
                 float[] color,
                 FloatBuffer vertexBuffer,
                 int firstVertex,
                 int vertexCount,
                 int coordsPerVertex,
                 int vertexStride)
        Issues the draw call. Does the full setup on every call.
        Parameters:
        mvpMatrix - The 4x4 projection matrix.
        color - A 4-element color vector.
        vertexBuffer - Buffer with vertex data.
        firstVertex - Index of first vertex to use in vertexBuffer.
        vertexCount - Number of vertices in vertexBuffer.
        coordsPerVertex - The number of coordinates per vertex (e.g. x,y is 2).
        vertexStride - Width, in bytes, of the data for each vertex (often vertexCount * sizeof(float)).
